definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Further, other, non-trisomic abnormalities may also demonstrate an enlarged nuchal transparency.
sentences.chinese: 此外，其他非三体异常可能也表明扩大颈部透明度。

sentences.english: At last, enhance the transparency of their operations and strengthen the external intendance .
sentences.chinese: 最后要增强其运行的透明度，加强外界的监督。

sentences.english: They called for greater transparency and a new code of ethics.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求更高的透明度和一个新的道德守则。

sentences.english: There is a question about the accountability of these organizations and their transparency.
sentences.chinese: 这事关这些组织的解释责任和它们的透明度。

sentences.english: I'll lighten it by taking down the opacity of that level when I'm done.
sentences.chinese: 我做完后，会通过降低那层的不透明度来加亮它。

sentences.english: Sets the destination blend function used in blended transparency and antialiasing operations.
sentences.chinese: 设定源混合方法用来混合透明度和平滑处理。

sentences.english: The color, odor and taste of the ultrafiltration low grade wine are better than that of the uncleared.
sentences.chinese: 超滤白酒的透明度，口味物优于未超滤的酒。

sentences.english: Scagliola diaphaneity is bad, and without burnish.
sentences.chinese: 人造大理石透明度不好，而且没有光泽。

sentences.english: Randomly paint the layer with a 200px soft brush with 60% opacity.
sentences.chinese: 用透明度60%，粗细200px的软笔刷随便涂鸦。

sentences.english: Next, these reforms would bring new transparency to financial dealings.
sentences.chinese: 其次，这些改革将带来新的金融交易的透明度。

sentences.english: The glass is coated with a solid white fritted finish with some degree of transparency.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃表面有一层白色烧结的涂层并有一定的透明度。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has braced itself for more administrative transparency.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府已做好准备增加政务透明度。

sentences.english: On the other side, important understandings with respect to mitigation and transparency.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，在减缓和透明度方面的重要谅解。

sentences.english: If necessary, the opacities of these ground layers can be lowered just a touch.
sentences.chinese: 如有必要，这些地面图层的不透明度可以降低一点。

sentences.english: Improving openness of the politics and mass superintend system.
sentences.chinese: 实行财务公开，提高透明度和群众监督机制。

sentences.english: Draw a white line as image below and reduce its Opacity to 60 degree.
sentences.chinese: 下面画一条白线的图像，并减少其不透明度为60度。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
